transbit.tbits.Helper
Class LinkFormatter

java.lang.Object
  transbit.tbits.Helper.LinkFormatter

public class LinkFormatter
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides utility services to transform and render links and smart links.

hyperSmartLinks

public static java.lang.String hyperSmartLinks(java.lang.String aString,

                                               int aMaxActionId,
                                               int aMaxEmailActionId,
                                               java.lang.String aServer,
                                               int aAppendInterface,
                                               int aToolTipType)
Method to replace the substring containing BusinessArea#Number with the corresponding hyperlinks and highlighting them.

Parameters:
aString - the String in which the # sign has to be replaced with the hyperlinks
aSameRequestLink - this requests smart link text
aMaxActionId - Max action Id of the request
aServer - to form full url
Returns:
the String with the # replaced with the hyper links
